trans-unit.source: Contains data associated with the termination of a workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Contém dados associados ao encerramento de uma instância de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs> is generated by the runtime tracking infrastructure when a workflow instance is terminated.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs> é gerado pelo tempo de execução de infra-estrutura de rastreamento quando uma instância de fluxo de trabalho é encerrada.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> associated with a workflow instance includes a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> configured for a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent.Terminated><xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>, the workflow tracking infrastructure puts the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs> in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.EventArgs%2A> in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord> that it sends to the tracking service.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> associados com um fluxo de trabalho inclui instância um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint> configurado para um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent.Terminated> <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowEvent>, coloca infra-estrutura de controle de fluxo de trabalho a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs> na <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.EventArgs%2A> no <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord> que ele envia para o serviço de acompanhamento.

trans-unit.source: A workflow instance may be terminated in one of three ways: the host may call <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Terminate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>; a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity> activity may be invoked from inside the workflow instance; or an unhandled exception may occur.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância de fluxo de trabalho pode ser encerrada em uma das três maneiras: o host pode chamar <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Terminate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>; <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity> atividade pode ser chamada de dentro da instância de fluxo de trabalho; ou pode ocorrer uma exceção sem tratamento.

trans-unit.source: If the workflow is terminated by the host or a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity> activity, the runtime tracking infrastructure sets <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs.Exception%2A> to a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowTerminatedException> that has its <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property set to a description of the reason for the termination.
trans-unit.target: Se o fluxo de trabalho é encerrado com o host ou um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity> atividade, o tempo de execução de conjuntos de infraestrutura de rastreamento <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs.Exception%2A> para um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowTerminatedException> que tem seu <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> propriedade definida como uma descrição do motivo de encerramento.

trans-unit.source: If the workflow is terminated because of an unhandled exception, the runtime tracking infrastructure passes the unhandled exception in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs.Exception%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se o fluxo de trabalho for encerrado devido a uma exceção sem tratamento, a infra-estrutura de controle de tempo de execução passa a exceção sem tratamento em <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs.Exception%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs> is used only by the runtime tracking service to pass information in a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs> é usado somente pelo tempo de execução do serviço de rastreamento para transmitir informações em um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord>.

trans-unit.source: The data for a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowTerminated?displayProperty=nameWithType> event is passed in a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowTerminatedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Os dados para um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowTerminated?displayProperty=nameWithType> evento é transmitido um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowTerminatedEventArgs>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a method, named `WriteTerminatedEventArgs`, which captures a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra um método chamado `WriteTerminatedEventArgs`, que captura um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs>.

trans-unit.source: The code checks whether the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs.Exception%2A> property is `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: O código verifica se o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs.Exception%2A> é de propriedade `null` (`Nothing` no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: If it is not, the code writes the message associated with the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs.Exception%2A> property to the console.
trans-unit.target: Se não for, o código grava a mensagem associada a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs.Exception%2A> propriedade para o console.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs.Exception%2A> is `null` (`Nothing`), the code does not write any exception information to the console.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs.Exception%2A> é `null` (`Nothing`), o código de não gravar informações de exceção no console.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the EventArgs Tracking SDK Sample from the Program.cs file.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte do EventArgs controle SDK exemplo do arquivo Program.cs.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [EventArgs Tracking Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/94818da2-c3c4-4a13-b47a-a0fb30dbbf1c).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [EventArgs controle exemplo](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/94818da2-c3c4-4a13-b47a-a0fb30dbbf1c).

trans-unit.source: Gets the exception that caused the workflow instance to be terminated.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a exceção que fez a instância de fluxo de trabalho ser encerrada.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> that caused the workflow instance to be terminated.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> que causou a instância de fluxo de trabalho a ser encerrada.

trans-unit.source: When the workflow instance is terminated because of an unhandled exception, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs.Exception%2A> contains the unhandled exception.
trans-unit.target: Quando a instância de fluxo de trabalho é encerrada devido a uma exceção sem tratamento, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs.Exception%2A> contém a exceção sem tratamento.

trans-unit.source: When the workflow instance is terminated by either a host call to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Terminate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or by a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity> activity, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs.Exception%2A> contains a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowTerminatedException> that has its <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property set to a description of the reason for the termination.
trans-unit.target: Quando a instância de fluxo de trabalho é encerrada por uma chamada de host para <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Terminate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> ou por um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity> atividade, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs.Exception%2A> contém um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.WorkflowTerminatedException> que tem seu <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> propriedade definida como uma descrição do motivo de encerramento.

trans-unit.source: If the host terminates the workflow instance, it supplies this description in the `string` parameter to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Terminate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>; if the workflow instance is terminated by a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity>, the description is supplied by <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity.Error%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Se o host encerra a instância de fluxo de trabalho, ele fornece essa descrição no `string` parâmetro <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Terminate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>; se a instância de fluxo de trabalho é encerrada com um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity>, a descrição é fornecida pelo <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.TerminateActivity.Error%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a method, named `WriteTerminatedEventArgs`, which captures a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra um método chamado `WriteTerminatedEventArgs`, que captura um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs>.

trans-unit.source: The code checks whether the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs.Exception%2A> property is `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: O código verifica se o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs.Exception%2A> é de propriedade `null` (`Nothing` no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: If it is not, the code writes the message associated with the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs.Exception%2A> property to the console.
trans-unit.target: Se não for, o código grava a mensagem associada a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs.Exception%2A> propriedade para o console.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs.Exception%2A> is `null` (`Nothing`), the code does not write any exception information to the console.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingWorkflowTerminatedEventArgs.Exception%2A> é `null` (`Nothing`), o código de não gravar informações de exceção no console.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the EventArgs Tracking SDK Sample from the Program.cs file.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte do EventArgs controle SDK exemplo do arquivo Program.cs.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [EventArgs Tracking Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/94818da2-c3c4-4a13-b47a-a0fb30dbbf1c).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [EventArgs controle exemplo](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/94818da2-c3c4-4a13-b47a-a0fb30dbbf1c).
